content.question: Fallingwater and Le Corbusier’s Villa Savoye represent similarities in the artists’ approach to domestic architecture in that both buildings

choices.label: were designed to incorporate the structures’ natural surroundings
are designed around universally accepted ideal shapes and forms
celebrate the clean, geometric lines of European modernism
include handcrafted furnishings designed for their interiors

content.answer: were designed to incorporate the structures’ natural surroundings
